dialog-2step.contentchangephone: If you’re not getting the app notification or the SMS code for 2-step login, check that:
dialog-2step.item2: You’re checking the device you set up your 2-setup login with
dialog-2step.item3: You have notifications from ESCROW enabled
dialog-2step.contentaccept: If it’s still not working - you can change your phone number.
